channel.title: James Fenn
channel.description: Writer of bad puns and slightly better software. This website contains information about my adventures in programming, current projects, and me.

item.title: Animating SVG Icons on the Web
item.description: A small breakdown of the process I used to create a couple interactive icons for a web project.

item.title: AIGHT: a Low-effort Productivity Tool
item.description: AIGHT is a command-line tool for getting todo tasks quickly.

item.title: Ethics of Artificial Intelligence
item.description: An overview of the discourse surrounding "ethical AI" and its use in the Big Tech industry.

item.title: Federated Social Networks
item.description: Explaining what the fediverse is, how to join it, and why.

item.title: Ethical Source and Subjectivity
item.description: A mini-summary / explanation of some criticisms of the Ethical Source Movement.

item.title: Free Software and RMS
item.description: A summary of my thoughts on the relationship between Richard Stallman and the Free Software Movement.

item.title: Open Source in Education
item.description: A discussion of the open source model as a solution to many issues in higher education.

item.title: JavaScript: Productivity over Proof
item.description: In the vast majority everyday software, nobody writes a mathematical proof of every piece of functionality. Dynamically typed languages exist for a reason, and this is not it.

item.title: Thoughts About Aptoide's 'Play Fair' Campaign
item.description: Sharing my opinions about Aptoide's 'play fair' campaign and some of the claims made in their argument.

item.title: Right to Repair
item.description: A summary of the main points surrounding the debate over Right to Repair and an argument in favour of it, with a focus on Apple devices and customer experience.

item.title: Introduction to Android: Contexts, Intents, and the Activity lifecycle
item.description: A basic overview of the main components of an Android app and how they interact with each other and the Android system.

item.title: Joining Freenode IRC: A Guide
item.description: Basic (but detailed) instructions for setting up a Freenode IRC account through various clients.

item.title: Continuous Integration with Travis CI for Android
item.description: An in-depth tutorial explaining how to set up Travis CI to deploy signed builds to Google Play. Among other things.

item.title: CSS Submodules
item.description: How I organize my site's CSS and why.

item.title: Exceptional Traveler
item.description: I explain how and why (sort of) I wrote an implementation of the Traveling Salesperson Problem using Exceptional Programming standards.

item.title: Pricing Models
item.description: TL;DR - Don't work for free.

item.title: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH
item.description: A small command-line utility I wrote with Go that I had a lot of fun with.

item.title: Client-Side JavaScript
item.description: Why I rewrote my site with Jekyll, rather than running a ton of client-side JavaScript that doesn't really work all of the time.

item.title: Attribouter
item.description: A short breakdown of a really really big library I wrote to credit contributors and libraries used in my Android projects.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I made a blog.
